home.headline: Make bold F1 2026 predictions.
home.subtitle: Answer 23 F1 questions that test your racing knowledge.
home.flow_step_1: Open Predictions and answer 23 questions once (about 3-5 minutes).
home.flow_step_2: Create or join private/public groups to compare picks with people you know.
home.flow_step_3: Track race-by-race leaderboard projections to see where you would place if the season ended today.

about_page.title: About {company_name}
about_page.about_intro_1: This website is an independent, community-driven Formula 1 season prediction game.
about_page.about_intro_2: Participants submit season-long predictions before the first race weekend begins. After the deadline, predictions are locked and cannot be changed. After the final race, results are calculated based on official season outcomes.
about_page.about_intro_3: The platform is a set-and-forget prediction challenge that rewards thoughtful forecasting rather than ongoing activity. The website exists purely for entertainment purposes.
about_page.audience_body: This platform is intended for users aged 18 years or older. By creating an account, users confirm they meet this age requirement.
about_page.how_body_1: Users create an account with username, email address, and password.
about_page.how_body_2: Usernames are visible to participants. Email addresses are only accessible to global platform administrators.
about_page.how_body_3: Users can join public groups or private groups (invite link or password required). Group owners can assign admins, edit group rules, and remove members.
about_page.how_body_4: All predictions must be submitted before the deadline. After the deadline, predictions are locked and timestamps are kept for integrity.
about_page.def_1: The published Formula 1 results are used where possible.
about_page.def_2: When multiple answers are correct, all correct answers earn points.
about_page.def_3: Where race, DNF, podium, etc. are mentioned, this refers to a Grand Prix and not a sprint (unless stated otherwise).
about_page.def_4: A DNS or DSQ does not qualify as a DNF.
about_page.def_5: The season ends directly after the final race and the availability of results, unless there is a known reason to wait for impactful controversies to be resolved (such as disqualification).
about_page.results_body_1: Final standings are calculated from official Formula 1 season results.
about_page.results_body_2_prefix: For specific statistical components (such as sustained damage estimations), we may use public data from
about_page.results_body_3: We are not responsible for errors, delays, or changes in third-party data sources.
about_page.results_body_4: This platform is not affiliated with Formula 1, FIA, or any official motorsport entity. All trademarks, team names, and driver names remain property of their respective owners.
about_page.private_body_1: Groups may define their own informal rules in group descriptions.
about_page.private_body_2: The platform does not collect, process, manage, or distribute money. It does not organize competitions for financial gain, mediate disputes, or facilitate gambling.
about_page.private_body_3: Any private arrangements between participants are fully outside this website and remain the users' own responsibility.
about_page.fair_body_1: We reserve the right to remove accounts involved in abuse, fraud, or manipulation, and to remove content that violates law.
about_page.fair_body_2: We may add, suspend, or discontinue platform features when needed.
about_page.fair_body_3: For scoring disputes, the final interpretation of questions and correct answers is determined by website administrators.
about_page.fair_body_4: The platform is provided as-is without guarantees of uninterrupted availability.
about_page.law_body: Unless mandatory law states otherwise, these terms are governed by Dutch law and disputes fall under the competent courts in the Netherlands.
about_page.liability_body: The platform is not liable for direct or indirect damages, financial losses, or disputes from user interactions or private arrangements.
about_page.privacy_body_1: We collect username, email address, encrypted password, and basic activity data required for platform functionality.
about_page.privacy_body_2: Email addresses are used for account verification, security/account communication, important platform updates, and optional future season invitations.
about_page.privacy_body_3: We do not sell personal data and do not send marketing newsletters.
about_page.cookies_body: We use essential cookies/sessions for login state, account security, language preference, and core platform functionality.
about_page.retention_body_1: Account data is retained while an account is active. Users can delete their account in account settings.
about_page.retention_body_2: Accounts inactive for 24 months may be removed to minimize stored data; we may attempt to notify users beforehand by email.
about_page.retention_body_3: Deleted accounts and associated personal data are removed from active systems, except where retention is required for legal or security reasons.
about_page.export_body: Users may request a summary/export of account data by contacting us via email.
about_page.contact_body: For support, privacy, data access/export, or legal questions:
about_page.donate_support_line: You can also support the creators with a donation to help cover hosting costs.
